website_summaries.verdict: Medical-grade gloves that are ideal for home use and other jobs that require thinner gloves.
pros: 3ml thick barrier protection with textured fingertips
Thin and ideal for lighter jobs and home use
cons: Some gloves break just when putting them on

customer_reviews.title: They work great. My palm is 8 inches around and from ...
customer_reviews.text: I use these for coloring my hair or applying self-tanner. They work great. My palm is 8 inches around and from the top of my middle finger to the base of my palm is 7.5 inches. You can see in the picture how the medium glove fits.
customer_reviews.author: MollyCMo

customer_reviews.title: Allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: I'm a nurse, so I've used many brands of gloves over the years. I have very sensitive skin, but have never had any issues with gloves. This brand, unfortunately, was the exception. Broke out into a painful rash every time I wore these. Would not recommend these for anyone with sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the texture and the thickness
customer_reviews.text: They're just what I wanted for work (clinical and rehabilitation facility). The fingers are textured to resist slipping and the thickness helps me feel more secure about ... messy ... situations. I ordered the Medium but I think that a Small may be a little more of a snug fit (which I usually prefer). That said, the medium leaves opportunity to put on another pair after finishing with one patient to the next (sweat and/or alcohol rub resistance) without snapping or ripping the cuffs. I plan to order more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: No rips!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! I hate wearing thick gloves and so I use these while woodworking to protect my hands from splinters. They do the job! They also held up impressively well while I was caulking last night. A couple times I hit snags and was sure they'd ripped, but no! Actually, in the few weeks I've had these, I don't think they've ripped once. The Mr. Clean ones I buy at the store rip routinely with what I do. Very happy with these - I'm sticking with this brand!
customer_reviews.author: Liz L.

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t be without
customer_reviews.text: I’m a retired nurse that finds there the are just only some many things you want to get your hands dirty for. Making meatloaf is not one of them, so I keep this box in the kitchen where I use it constantly. They aren’t supposed to last all day, just for your task at hand. So if you don’t want your hands to smell like onions and garlic, or turn orange from peeling and chopping a lot of carrots, grab a pair. It’s a nice barrier.
customer_reviews.author: RNreading

customer_reviews.title: A bit more durability and these gloves would be really winners!
customer_reviews.text: It's a good deal because you get soooo many gloves in a user-friendly dispenser box. However, about 9-10% of the gloves break apart during light use or even while putting them on. Because of this, they are a tad delicate/inadequate. I use them mainly for light to medium yardwork, including cleaning up after doggie, and for other cleaning tasks.. Most of the gloves work very well, and go on easy and come off easy. too. For the reasons stated, I would give this product 3 1/2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Abbey S.

customer_reviews.title: Was sent a damaged box of gloves
customer_reviews.text: I never had issues with this product in the past and i have been ordering these desposable gloves for awhile now. The original package which this box of gloves and other items ordered together were in was in perfect shape when i opened the box, the box of gloves was in a bad shape while other items were all new and in good shape. When i buy something that is supposed to be new, i expect it to be new.
customer_reviews.author: Peter A.

customer_reviews.title: Material is thin and not safe for medical uses as it rips easily. Luckily I only purchased one box
customer_reviews.text: There are manufacture defects resulting in holes in gloves. Material is thin and not safe for medical uses as it rips easily. Luckily I only purchased one box. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: sim

customer_reviews.title: ALREADY-USED gloves in the box
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered these gloves three times. The first two boxes were great. The third box so far (and I’m not very into the box) has contained four ALREADY-USED gloves. These gloves were crumbled into little balls, had visible residue on them, and emitted unpleasant odors.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Durable.
customer_reviews.text: I don't use these gloves for medical purposes, just to keep my hands clean. They are pretty durable. I always end up putting extras in my pocket expecting them to rip, but they keep going. I used to buy nitrile gloves from a medical supply store that were really thin and more expensive. These seem to stand up to motor oil very well btw. A really good deal for 200, when most boxes are in 50 or 100. This brand is a repeat purchase in my household and we're happy.
customer_reviews.author: JDH

customer_reviews.title: A fine glove for the average household.
customer_reviews.text: These fit slightly smaller than other gloves I've used. I ordered medium. I used these when I change the cat litter box so I don't need "high performance" but I think these gloves are fine for the average household. The material is thick enough for light handling of yucky materials or raw meats. I like these because I hate latex powder.
customer_reviews.author: ____Top Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: Good for many tasks.
customer_reviews.text: Great disposable gloves. I actually am able to reuse them in many cases 2 or more times. I used them for everything from cooking to light gardening (not meant for digging dirt) or cleaning kids bruises. I already purchased them 4 times and intend on restocking once I am out.
customer_reviews.author: Mogadishu 207

customer_reviews.title: Good Disposable Gloves!
customer_reviews.text: Good gloves! The box is falling apart but the gloves don't break as easily as the ones from the store do (Nitrile I think). So, maybe the box isn't great but the gloves are. With 200 in the box, I don't have to buy them so frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like em
customer_reviews.text: I think I found my new gloves. I give them two glove's up. I think it's worth mentioning that my hands in my opinion are kinda small for a guy, and I prefer the Large size. The medium size fits a little too tight. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the quality of these gloves (I have purchased a number of different brands in this type of glove) and. the price can't be beat. -Many uses around the house - gardening season is coming up and I wear these under my gardening gloves to keep my nails in decent shape.
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: I love these cause I use them when I'm cleaning the ...
customer_reviews.text: Disposable Nitrile Exam powder free gloves, I love these cause I use them when I'm cleaning the Bathroom,kitty litter ,taking trash out, I can't live without these gloves,and if your useing bleach or cleaners these help keep chemicals away from your hands! Thanks K.Red
customer_reviews.author: Reddin

customer_reviews.title: I use these for everything!
customer_reviews.text: Use these to cook, clean and apply sunless tanning lotion! They work for anything and everything you need. This is my second box I keep them all over the house, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JFN

customer_reviews.title: I use them for cleaning around the house and changing the oil and other fluids in the car or working on dirty bikes. They are no
customer_reviews.text: These are similar quality to the gloves in the hospital. I use them for cleaning around the house and changing the oil and other fluids in the car or working on dirty bikes. They are not the thickest I've had, however they work well for most things.
customer_reviews.author: Northwest girl

customer_reviews.title: Quality Gloves for Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: These are an excellent value! I haven't found any deals to beat this, and now one of my dash buttons is reserved for this! I am allergic to Latex, and these are latex-free. They are a pretty good one-size-fits-all, unless your hands are unusually large or small I suppose. Pretty color (blue) to boot!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Wife uses them like crazy
customer_reviews.text: Wife uses them generally for protecting hands and for health. For cleaning, handling raw poultry with hidden pointy bones, etc. She cooks quite a bit so we use a continual supply.
customer_reviews.author: evan1138

customer_reviews.title: Great disposable gloves
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, feel comfortable- not too loose, not too tight. Small size works well for my hands. Thin and able to use smart phone with gloves on for most features.
customer_reviews.author: Foster_Furbabies

customer_reviews.title: Protection as hand
customer_reviews.text: Love the feel, the color, the fit. Works for what I need from messy projects to protection when opening mail and packages.

customer_reviews.title: Love these gloves
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Got this to replce another brand that was cheaper but gave me hives on my hands almost instantly. These are my go to

customer_reviews.title: Work great, for well, good quality
customer_reviews.text: These are good. We use them for cooking, handling meats and all other foods. They serve their purpose, fit fine, good thickness, don’t tear easy, and make cooking easier.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Good product and price
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Never had one rip. The type of surgical procedures I do involve the house, cleaning and automotive maintenance. These things hold up pretty well
customer_reviews.author: rmsilva07

customer_reviews.title: Wished it was a bit stronger
customer_reviews.text: This is a good value so when I break a glove, I'll just grab another. I just wish they were stronger and did not tear so easily. I thought "nitrile" was supposed to be super durable? At least it doesn't have that gross powder smell, as these are powder free!
customer_reviews.author: theRett

customer_reviews.title: The fit is perfect, too
customer_reviews.text: I use these gloves for a lot around the house- cleaning, painting, dealing with raw meat. The fit is perfect, too. I'll definitely be ordering these again when I run out!

customer_reviews.title: Too thin. Breaks easily.
customer_reviews.text: These are super thin and cheap. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Cost effective Nitrile Gloves
customer_reviews.text: Reorder - some seem smaller than others. Good for cleaning. Would buy again

customer_reviews.title: Very thin and not for much other than exams
customer_reviews.text: Very thin and tear easily - I have purchased similar gloves and had better results. If you are considering these for light duty around the garage stuff be warned - they are only for VERY LIGHT duty.
customer_reviews.author: Quality Matters

customer_reviews.title: larger than expected
customer_reviews.text: I ordered large because I am a tall woman 5’8” but that was a mistake, they were too way too big. The medium fits perfectly. The large probably only fit big man hands.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price$
customer_reviews.text: I bough them to give to give away to a Doctor in Mexico. He said he love them and that they work as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Like that they come in box of 200 but many ...
customer_reviews.text: Like that they come in box of 200 but many times have found my thumb or finger sticking through holes in the glove after light cleaning or when using oil based products. I recommend Safety Zone brand.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Mint

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have used these gloves to wash dishes, small cleaning jobs, and painting they held up well. i
customer_reviews.author: Vera K.

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves! Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Great purple gloves! Perfect fit when correct size is ordered. It’s always a gamble to try a new brand but these are much much better than expected. As strong as the brand name & less expensive. Very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Caregiver Gloves
customer_reviews.text: I purchase these for my mother’s caregivers. Price is reasonable and gloves are a good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sue from NOLA

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: Thinnest gloves I’ve ever ordered not sure of these would like thicker gloves for med use
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Gloves are porous. My hands got wet. I ...
customer_reviews.text: Gloves are porous. My hands got wet. I filled a few with different temperatures of water, making sure that the outside of the gloves were dry and placed them on a dry surface. Within 5 minutes all of the gloves were 'sweating' water, mostly on the palms and backs of the gloves, although some of the fingers were also damp on the outside. Poorly made glove. Will never buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: EllenA

customer_reviews.title: Many are ripped
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed in this product. Too many of the gloves are ripped to the point of not being usable.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Overall they are decent gloves but I found defective/melted gloves in the box also. Quality control?
customer_reviews.author: carolyn ainsworth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just like the other ones I bought from the drugstore except many more and much cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: This is a great deal!
customer_reviews.text: I'm allergic to vinyl gloves and buying the 10 packs of nitrile gloves locally at Walmart can get wicked expensive. This is a great deal!

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: For the quality, quantity and price...it doesn't get any better. Fits very well. This is my second order and I will continue purchasing these nitrile gloves in the future.

customer_reviews.title: Protect your skin from chemical cleaners, and paint. Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Good product for those nasty cleaning jobs! I wear then to paint as well..take them off..bam..clean hands!

customer_reviews.title: Could be better.
customer_reviews.text: Gloves fit well to work but unfortunately I got through 2 pairs of gloves throughout my shift at work. I deal with money all the time so I picked these gloves but I’ve had better that hasn’t caused a rip or hole in it during my shift.
customer_reviews.author: Iris Au

customer_reviews.title: but these are a great deal. A lot of gloves tend to have ...
customer_reviews.text: Nitrile gloves are usually more expensive than latex, but these are a great deal. A lot of gloves tend to have a bit of a smell, but these don't. And I mostly use these for cooking so it's great that they're powder-free.

customer_reviews.title: (g)love them!
customer_reviews.text: They work. Was worried I was getting a size too small, but for what I need them for, a snug fit is much better than loose. I can handle tools with precision.

customer_reviews.title: Great for cleaning...
customer_reviews.text: Happy with this purchase. They don't break like some other brands I've purchased. I use them for cleaning the house and to keep cleaner off my hands. Grest for dying hair as well.

customer_reviews.text: I use these when I clean home medical equipment and they work fine. They are very well priced and i savev a lot of money not buying them at the store.

customer_reviews.text: Nice large carton with 200 gloves. True to size,easy to get on. No problems with tearing, or my nails going through the gloves. Will definitely reorder when these run out.

product_meta.title: Dealmed Brand Nitrile Medical Grade Exam Gloves, Disposable, Latex-Free, 200 Count, Size X-Small
feature_bullets: QUALITY CONSTRUCTION: Providing more protection and eliminating allergies associated with latex gloves, these Medical-Grade Exam Gloves are expertly crafted out of nitrile material to provide optimal protection and comfort.

OPTIMAL COMFORT: The nitrile gloves are designed with a highly elastic fit and beaded cuffs to provide a snug, secure fit when wearing gloves for extended periods of time. Additionally, they offer tactile sensitivity for delicate patient care.

UTMOST PROTECTION: Ambidextrous and disposable, these non-allergenic and non-irritating gloves are tested and approved for protection against fentanyl exposure, and strong enough to protect against liquids and chemicals.

MULTI-PURPOSE USE: The Dealmed Nitrile Medical-Grade Exam Gloves are ideal for all-purpose medical use, police investigations, lab work, hair coloring, tattooing, food prep, painting, cleaning, pet care, home improvements, hobbies, and arts & crafts.

EFFICIENT PACKAGING: Soft-Fill Technology dispenses the gloves with ease and unwrinkled because they are packaged flat. This allows for more efficient and expedient use when you need to grab a pair of gloves to protect your hands.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars51 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
